Class
Description
AccelerationSystem
Accelerates entities by force.
ActionQueue
A collection of queued actions to apply to containing entities.
ActionQueueComponentConverter
 
ActionResourceConverterFactory
ResourceConverterFactory for core actions.
ActionSystem
Dequeues and applies actions on entities.
Bounds
A closed boundary.
BoundsComponentConverter
 
Chain
Maintains references to a single positional and multiple rotational anchors.
ChainSystem
Repositions chained entities.
Collidable
A marker indicating that the owning entity can respond to collisions.
CollidableComponentConverter
 
CollisionSystem
Simmulates collisions for Collidable Intersected entities.
Correctable
A marker indicating that the owning entity can respond to boundary intersections.
CorrectableComponentConverter
 
CorrectionSystem
Repositions Correctable Intersected entities just enough to remove the immediate intersection.
Damping
Damping applied on an entity.
DampingComponentConverter
 
DampingSystem
Applies damping to entity velocities.
Force
Net force acting on an entity.
ForceComponentConverter
 
Go
Ephemeral marker of where an entity wants to go and how intent it is on getting there.
GoSystem
Makes entities go where they request to.
Intersected
Notes that an intersection between entities occurred.
IntersectionSystem
Detects entity intersections.
Limit<T extends dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.entity.Component>
Imposes some limit on components of type Limit.
LimitSystem<T extends dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.entity.Component,L extends Limit<T>>
Applies Limit constraints to components.
Mass
Mass of an entity.
MassComponentConverter
 
MovementSystem
Applies velocity to entity positions.
Orientation
Facing of an entity in space.
OrientationComponentConverter
 
Path
Maintains a sequence of steps to go through.
PathComponentConverter
 
PathSystem
Moves an entity sequentially through the steps in a Path by adding Go instances to it.
PhysicsCleanupSystem
Removes physics-related event components.
Position
Placement of an entity in space.
PositionComponentConverter
 
Spawner
Provides clones of entity templates between 2 radii around some position.
SpawnSystem
Spawns entity clones from spawner entities.
Velocity
Velocity of a moving entity.
VelocityComponentConverter
 
VelocityLimit
Constrains the maximum attainable speed of an entity.
VelocityLimitComponentConverter
